column4: how do I turn off strong password checking (i.e. passwd won't reject "bad" or "simple" passwords)?  I looked in /etc/pam.d/passwd and didn't find anything beyond @include password-common ...  I also tried googling but had no luck... and please don't try to convince me not to do this or that it's a bad idea
never heard of that feature and been using ubuntu for 4yrs
I'm using the passwd command line program
